String.string: Helvarian's research is too vital to interrupt. Help him however you can.
I'll let Elben know how helpful you were. Thanks.
Kill one Tirkai grizzly, argonomorph Tirkai grizzly, and argonomorph mugato.
Kill two Tirkai grizzlies, argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies, and argonomorph mugatos.
Kill three Tirkai grizzlies, argonomorph Tirkai grizzlies, and argonomorph mugatos.
